name: Kempinski Hotel Amman

reviews.text: After my stay at the Dead Sea and in Aqaba i finally moved on to Kempinski Hotel Amman. Knowing the other hotels in Amman as luxurious but quite old fashioned .....I was extremely surprised. The hotel is very bright and modern with a great pool terrace.
reviews.title: Great modern and bright hotel

likes.liked: — The location and the good food quality
likes.disliked: — The fact that they don't have a larger meeting room for our next meeting

description: Kempinski Hotel Amman embraces luxurious 278 rooms and suites; delicately refined to liberate your senses. The breathtaking view from all rooms, the contemporary design and features add a magical touch to your visit and a sense of relaxation.
